Posts.EditableText:
2012 marks my 10th year as a Quest fan.

My first ever game was called Ebersmile, which is still downloadable. This game was intended to be the very first multi-user online Quest game, using QuestNet.
However, my skills have progressed since using Quest years ago and I have been developing some basic talent in Visual Basic, as my ideas were limited with the Quest gaming software.

I have been working on a text-based gaming engine from scratch on and off for the passed couple of years. It is specifically online gameplay only. When the engine is finished, I want to recreate my world of Ebersmile for all to play.

Screenshot:
[img:ujdiuqha]http://www.draignet.com/hosted/screen29.jpg[/img:ujdiuqha]
